author: newsr.in
title: Apple CEO Tim Cook courts the enterprise: ‘This is not a hobby’ - newsR
text: SAN FRANCISCO — Apple chief executive Tim Cook stopped by Box’s customer conference to chat about his company’s efforts into the enterprise: “It’s a huge area for us.” In an interview that appeared reminiscent to Cook’s appearance on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert, the talk covered all areas, including mobility in the workplace and also a […] »
